rules_text:
Choose five. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Create a 1/1 white Squirrel creature token with “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, muse 1.” [i](Choose a counter on a permanent you control or a card you own in in exile. Remove it or add another.)[/i]
• Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.
